description:
![ChatGPT Screenshot](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/asheroto/chocolatey-projects-forked/main/ChatGPT/screenshot.jpg)
        
## Summary

This is an unofficial desktop application of ChatGPT. You can find more information about it on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/lencx/ChatGPT).

## Features

-   Multi-platform: `macOS` `Linux` `Windows`
-   Text-to-Speech
-   Export ChatGPT history (PNG, PDF and Markdown)
-   Automatic application upgrade notification
-   Common shortcut keys
-   System tray hover window
-   Powerful menu items
-   Support for slash commands and their configuration (can be configured manually or synchronized from a file)
-   Customize global shortcuts
-   Pop-up Search
